mdRecord.dcterms:title: Photograph of Congressman Moore and U.S. Senator Jennings Randolph with an unidentified group of men
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Congressman Arch A. Moore, Jr. (seated, left) with Senator Jennings Randolph (seated, right) with an unidentified group of men at the Italian Sons and Daughters banquet held in Weirton, W. Va.
